item.title: Mentioned by MetroNews Canada
item.description:
Unifor plans rally outside Essex MP Jeff Watson's office

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Unifor to demonstrate at MP Jeff Watson's office
Union members plan to demonstrate in front of Conservative MP Jeff Watson's office in Essex at 2 p.m. Thursday. The Windsor and District Labour Council has issued a call to all affiliates to join the protest. The demonstration will be led by members of the new ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Tory MP's campaign alleges Elections Canada 'vendetta'
An official from Conservative MP Jeff Watson's 2011 campaign says Elections Canada has a 'vendetta' against the Conservative Party, CBC News has learned, as Watson joins a list of Conservative MPs fighting the agency in court. The MP for Essex, Ont., ...

item.title: Mentioned by Windsor Star (blog)
item.description:
Watson pushes to make adoption more affordable
Prime Minister Stephen Harper and his wife Laureen chat with Jeff Watson, Member of Parliament for Essex, and his adopted daughter Beatrice about the expanded Adoption Expense Tax Credit Thursday. ... MP Jeff Watson (C – Essex) said Canada is in a crisis situation when it comes to child welfare – with 30,000 adoptable children across the country and an average of only 2,000 being adopted each year – so that's why he's pushing for changes that will make adoption a more affordable option for families. Watson ...
